# Adopting Swift Error Constants

**Article**

Migrate existing C code to Swift, using the error constants provided by the System module.

## Overview

The C error constants map to Swift as follows:

- `E2BIG` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/argListTooLong]
- `EACCES` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/permissionDenied]
- `EADDRINUSE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/addressInUse]
- `EADDRNOTAVAIL` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/addressNotAvailable]
- `EAFNOSUPPORT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/addressFamilyNotSupported]
- `EAGAIN` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/resourceTemporarilyUnavailable]
- `EALREADY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/alreadyInProcess]
- `EAUTH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/authenticationError]
- `EBADARCH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/badCPUType]
- `EBADEXEC` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/badExecutable]
- `EBADF` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/badFileDescriptor]
- `EBADMACHO` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/malformedMachO]
- `EBADMSG` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/badMessage]
- `EBADRPC` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/rpcUnsuccessful]
- `EBUSY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/resourceBusy]
- `ECANCELED` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/canceled]
- `ECHILD` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noChildProcess]
- `ECONNABORTED` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/connectionAbort]
- `ECONNREFUSED` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/connectionRefused]
- `ECONNRESET` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/connectionReset]
- `EDEADLK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/deadlock]
- `EDESTADDRREQ` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/addressRequired]
- `EDEVERR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/deviceError]
- `EDOM` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/outOfDomain]
- `EDQUOT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/diskQuotaExceeded]
- `EEXIST` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/fileExists]
- `EFAULT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/badAddress]
- `EFBIG` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/fileTooLarge]
- `EFTYPE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/badFileTypeOrFormat]
- `EHOSTDOWN` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/hostIsDown]
- `EHOSTUNREACH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noRouteToHost]
- `EIDRM` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/identifierRemoved]
- `EILSEQ` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/illegalByteSequence]
- `EINPROGRESS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/nowInProgress]
- `EINTR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/interrupted]
- `EINVAL` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/invalidArgument]
- `EIO` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/ioError]
- `EISCONN` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/socketIsConnected]
- `EISDIR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/isDirectory]
- `ELAST` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/lastErrnoValue]
- `ELOOP` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManySymbolicLinkLevels]
- `EMFILE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyOpenFiles]
- `EMLINK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyLinks]
- `EMSGSIZE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/messageTooLong]
- `EMULTIHOP` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/multiHop]
- `ENAMETOOLONG` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/fileNameTooLong]
- `ENEEDAUTH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/needAuthenticator]
- `ENETDOWN` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/networkDown]
- `ENETRESET` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/networkReset]
- `ENETUNREACH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/networkUnreachable]
- `ENFILE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyOpenFilesInSystem]
- `ENOATTR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/attributeNotFound]
- `ENOBUFS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noBufferSpace]
- `ENODATA` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noData]
- `ENODEV` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/operationNotSupportedByDevice]
- `ENOENT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noSuchFileOrDirectory]
- `ENOEXEC` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/execFormatError]
- `ENOLCK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noLocks]
- `ENOLINK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noLink]
- `ENOMEM` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noMemory]
- `ENOMSG` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noMessage]
- `ENOPOLICY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noSuchPolicy]
- `ENOPROTOOPT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/protocolNotAvailable]
- `ENOSPC` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noSpace]
- `ENOSR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noStreamResources]
- `ENOSTR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notStream]
- `ENOSYS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noFunction]
- `ENOTBLK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notBlockDevice]
- `ENOTCONN` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/socketNotConnected]
- `ENOTDIR` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notDirectory]
- `ENOTEMPTY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/directoryNotEmpty]
- `ENOTRECOVERABLE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notRecoverable]
- `ENOTSOCK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notSocket]
- `ENOTSUP` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notSupported]
- `ENOTTY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/inappropriateIOCTLForDevice]
- `ENXIO` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noSuchAddressOrDevice]
- `EOPNOTSUPP` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notSupportedOnSocket]
- `EOVERFLOW` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/overflow]
- `EOWNERDEAD` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/previousOwnerDied]
- `EPERM` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/notPermitted]
- `EPFNOSUPPORT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/protocolFamilyNotSupported]
- `EPIPE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/brokenPipe]
- `EPROCLIM` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyProcesses]
- `EPROCUNAVAIL` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/rpcProcedureUnavailable]
- `EPROGMISMATCH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/rpcProgramVersionMismatch]
- `EPROGUNAVAIL` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/rpcProgramUnavailable]
- `EPROTONOSUPPORT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/protocolNotSupported]
- `EPROTOTYPE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/protocolWrongTypeForSocket]
- `EPROTO` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/protocolError]
- `EPWROFF` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/devicePowerIsOff]
- `EQFULL` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/outputQueueFull]
- `ERANGE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/outOfRange]
- `EREMOTE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyRemoteLevels]
- `EROFS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/readOnlyFileSystem]
- `ERPCMISMATCH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/rpcVersionMismatch]
- `ESHLIBVERS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/sharedLibraryVersionMismatch]
- `ESHUTDOWN` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/socketShutdown]
- `ESOCKTNOSUPPORT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/socketTypeNotSupported]
- `ESPIPE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/illegalSeek]
- `ESRCH` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/noSuchProcess]
- `ESTALE` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/staleNFSFileHandle]
- `ETIMEDOUT` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/timedOut]
- `ETIME` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/timeout]
- `ETOOMANYREFS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyReferences]
- `ETXTBSY` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/textFileBusy]
- `EUSERS` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/tooManyUsers]
- `EWOULDBLOCK` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/wouldBlock]
- `EXDEV` ⟶ [doc://com.apple.SwiftSystem/documentation/System/Errno/improperLink]

## Adopting System

- **Adopting Swift File Operations**: Migrate existing C code to Swift, using the file operations provided by the System module.
- **Adopting Swift File Options**: Migrate existing C code to Swift, using the file-operation options provided by the System module.
